intro: Discover other STEM eduction professionals, organizations, and events on our MINTvernetzt community platform and find inspiration for your work.
opportunities: Create profile pages for yourself, your organization, and create projects or events.

login.invalidCredentials: Your login credentials (email or password) are incorrect. Please check your entries.
login.notConfirmed: Your email address has not yet been confirmed. Please check your inbox and click on the confirmation link. If you haven't received an email, please check your spam folder or contact <0>Support</0>.

education.headline: Shaping education together
education.content: The nationwide STEM community thrives on <0>exchanging ideas, sharing knowledge, and learning from one another</0>. On our community platform, you can <0>connect with each other and with organizations, find inspiration, and locate<1>experts</1></0> on specific topics in your area.

growth.headline: How our community grows
growth.join: Become part of our constantly growing STEM community.

more.headline: Learn more
more.content: The MINTvernetzt community platform is a project launched in 2021 to sustainably strengthen the <0>STEM community across Germany</0>. Learn more about <0>MINTvernetzt's initiatives, the service and support centre for STEM professionals</0>, on our website.

faq.headline: Questions and answers
faq.supportQuestion: Can't find an answer to your question?
faq.supportCta: Feel free to send us an email at:
